text: Juha Harjula was a basketball player from Finland. Harjula competed at the 1964 Summer Olympics. He was born on 20 June 1942 and died on 12 March 2020.Juha Harjula == References == Category:1942 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Finnish basketball players Category:Olympians for Finland Category:Sportspeople from Helsinki
title: Juha Harjula
